about_the_game:
Verses of Hope | Demo lets players explore a part of a vast world where every poetic choice changes the game.



At the beginning of each level, players get an incomplete poem. Each part of the poem matches a section of the level, and players pick different lines to finish the poem. Each choice affects the art, music, difficulty, and story, making every playthrough unique.

To give you an idea of the game’s depth, each level can create up to 27 different variations, resulting in nearly 20,000 possible poem combinations.



Hope, a cute and brave spark that players control, represents the hopefulness of Helena, the last knight trying to bring light back to her world. Hope’s mission is crucial because he symbolizes the spark of light needed to drive away the darkness.

Hope’s journey through the world is full of challenges, but his determination and bravery make every moment special.

Let’s dive deeper into this story.

short_description: Verses of Hope | Demo is an interactive poetry adventure where you shape the world through the power of your words. Build your own poems to change the landscape and narrative. You can test our tutorial, and an entire complete level with 27 possibilities of variations.
